title: Habit, Addiction, & Ritual (Dealing With The Repetitions of Life)
description:
These are a few thoughts about the repetitions of life, from thoughtless habits, to deep addictions, to transforming rituals. And one thing I realize I did not discuss enough in this video are bad rituals, or what might be called addictive rituals. But we can save that for another time. Give it a listen and let me know what you think. 
.....
Please donate to this channel through PayPal. 
More than $50 at once or $10 per month will get you ten hours of AUDIO extras from the Anadromist. But anything is helpful.
Click this...    https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC................

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
  https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 

(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 
Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 

Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne


#addictions #habits #rituals
